channel.title: The New Command and Conquer has been cancelled
channel.description:
I didn't even know they were making one.
[url]https://www.commandandconquer.com/en/news/1380/a-new-future-for-command-conquer[/url]

item.title: The New Command and Conquer has been cancelled
item.dc:creator: Dreadmoth
item.description:
jessiestorm88:

Are any of the C&Cs past generals:zero hour worth checking out?

Depends who you ask…

Popular opinion seems to be that C&C3 and its expansion were good, Red Alert 3 was okay but its expansion was bad, and that C&C4 was dreadful.

I’ve only played C&C3 (thought it was okay) and the earlier games.

Read full topic
item.source: The New Command and Conquer has been cancelled

item.title: The New Command and Conquer has been cancelled
item.dc:creator: Surplus
item.description:
Bloodshot:

C&C died a long time ago for me.

This for me.

Also we all know this “economy based multiplayer experience” is another attempt to make dough from micro transactions.
